1111011010001100 1001010000110110 0 -> sum: 1000101011000010, cout: 1
0101101111100101 0011001101111001 0 -> sum: 1000111101011110, cout: 0
0000010010111001 0101010100110100 0 -> sum: 0101100111101101, cout: 0
1101000000111011 1000001001110100 1 -> sum: 0101001010110000, cout: 1
1001001010101101 0110010100000011 1 -> sum: 1111011110110001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
